text: Heinrich Ziegler (born 31 August 1891, date of death unknown) was a German fencer. He competed in the individual foil and team épée events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. He was killed in action during World War I. ==See also== * List of Olympians killed in World War I ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Year of death missing Category:German male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Germany Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:German military personnel killed in World War II
title: Heinrich Ziegler
